DOC.brief_summary: To determine functional effect Citicoline , natural supplement , administer duration four week ( 28 day ) non-psychiatric adolescent male participant . The investigator hypothesize citicoline provide cognitive benefit population 28 day supplementation .
DOC.brief_title: Cognizin Citicoline Dosing Healthy Adolescent Male Population
